## Learning Objectives

1. Describe what your team has learned and prioritzed throughout the *MTL* 12-session program.
2. Test how your team's plan aligns with your team's shared vision.
3. Apply decisions that your team has prioritized to implement in the clinic.

# In-session Exercise: *MTL* graduation and post-*MTL* plan (30 minutes)

1. Discuss what the team has learned through the *Modeling to Learn* 12-session program.

   •	What shared vision did the team decide on in session 1?

   •	How can the team gain value from using the *MTL* data UI going forward?

   •	How can the team gain from using the *MTL* sim UI going forward, and which module would be most appropriate to our team need and questions?

2.	Discuss how team learnings and prioritized decisions align with the team's shared vision.

   •	What hypotheses did we test? What did we learn? What decisions did we make?

   •	How do those decisions align with the team’s vision?

3.	Discuss how the team will follow up on *MTL*:

   •	Decisions the team will implement in the clinic

   •	*MTL* resources the team will use or revisit in the future

   •	Lead person(s) and time frame for the above actions 

4.	Celebrate completion of *Modeling to Learn*!
